T04sanss02u:1: evam eṣām ātmabhāvâdīnām utsṛṣṭānām api rakṣā kāryā /
T04sanss02u:10: evaṃrūpayā śāriputra hitâiṣikatayā samanvāgato bodhisatvo jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karotîti //
T04sanss02u:12: śakaṭam iva bhārôdvahanârthaṃ kevalaṃ dharmabuddhinā vāḍhavyam
T04sanss02u:54: kalyāṇamitrânuśāsanīpratipannasya kulaputra bodhisatvasya buddhā bhagavanto 'bhirāddhacittā bhavanti /
T04sanss02u:59: atâivâryasudhanaḥ sāradhvajasya bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasâbhivandyânekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkrṭya
T04sanss02u:60: sāradhvajaṃ bhikṣum avalokya praṇipatya punaḥ punar avalokayan
T04sanss02u:63: namasyann avanaman manasi kurvan cintayan bhāvayan
T04sanss02u:65: guṇān abhimukhīkurvan nigamayann atra sann anusmaran dṛḍhīkurvann avijahan manasâgamayann upanibadhnan praṇidhiṃ samavasaran
T04sanss02u:66: darśanam abhilaṣan svaranimittam udgṛhṇan yāvat tasyântikāt
T04sanss02u:68: tathā kalyāṇamitrâgataṃ sarvajñatāṃ saṃpaśyann aśrumukho rudan yāvan meghasya dramitasyântikāt prakrāntaḥ //
T04sanss02u:70: iha śāriputra bodhisatvo dharmakāmatayā nâsti tal loke
T04sanss02u:73: nâsti tat kāyôpasthānaṃ yan na karoti /
T04sanss02u:80: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyacchedāyâiṣa dharmaḥ saṃvartatae iti ratnacittam utpādya bhaiṣajyacittam
T04sanss02u:86: kasyacid antikāc catuṣpādikāṃ gāthāṃ śṛṇuyād uddiśed vôdgṛhṇīyād dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāsaṃprayuktāṃ
T04sanss02u:87: bodhisatvasaṃbhārôpacayaṃ vā tena tasminn ācārye dharmagauravaṃ karaṇīyaṃ yāvadbhir
T04sanss02u:91: yadi tāvatâivaṃ kalpāṃs tasyâcāryasyôpasthānaparicaryāṃ kuryād aśaṭhatayā
T04sanss02u:93: adyâpi gṛhapate na pratipūritam ācāryasyâcāryagauravaṃ bhavati /
T04sanss02u:96: kalyāṇamitreṣu ca tvayā kulaputra tīvraṃ gauravam utpādayitavyaṃ /
T04sanss02u:100: dhisatvo mahāsatvâivaṃrūpair guṇair gauravamanasikārair gacchann anupūrveṇânyatamanagaram
T04sanss02u:103: yan nv aham imam ātmabhāvaṃ vikrīyânena mūlyena dharmodgatasya
T04sanss02u:106: vikrītāni punar aparimāṇe saṃsāre 'parimāṇāni yāni mayā
T04sanss02u:107: kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānam anubhūtāni na punar evaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśâivaṃrūpāṇāṃ vā satvānāṃ satkārāya //
T04sanss02u:108: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'ntarāyaṇamadhyagataḥ śabdam udīrayām āsa ghoṣam anuśrāvayām
T04sanss02u:111: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyān brāhmaṇagṛhapatikāṃs tathā
T04sanss02u:112: samupasthāpayām āsa yathā taṃ ghoṣaṃ nâśrauṣuḥ /
T04sanss02u:113: yadâtmanaḥ krāyakaṃ na labhate tadâikântaṃ gatvā
T04sanss02u:114: prārodīd aśrūṇi ca prāvarttayad evaṃ câvadad /
T04sanss02u:115: aho vatâsmākaṃ durlabhā lābhā ye vayam ātmabhāvasyâpi
T04sanss02u:125: dharmapūjāṃ karttukāmaḥ so 'ham asya krāyakaṃ na labhe /
T04sanss02u:127: atha khalu sa māṇavakaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam
T04sanss02u:129: na mama kulaputra puruṣeṇa kṛtyam api tu khalu punaḥ pitur me yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ /
T04sanss02u:130: tatra me puruṣasya hṛdayena kṛtyaṃ lohitena câsthimajjayā ca /
T04sanss02u:133: lābhā me sulabdhāḥ pariniṣpannaṃ câtmānaṃ jāne
T04sanss02u:135: yan mayâtmanaḥ krāyako labdho hṛdaysya rudhirasya câsthimajjāyāś ca //
T04sanss02u:136: sa hṛṣṭacittaḥ kalyacittaḥ pramuditacittas taṃ māṇavakam etad avocat /
T04sanss02u:137: dāsyāmi māṇavaka yena te itâtmabhāvād arthaḥ /
T04sanss02u:138: yāvat sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ nisrāvayati sma
T04sanss02u:139: dakṣiṇaṃ côruṃ viddhvā nirmāṃsaṃ ca kṛtvâsthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlam upasaṃkrāmati //
T04sanss02u:141: atha khalv anyatarā śreṣṭhidārikôpariprāsādatalagatâdrākṣīt sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yāvat sā śreṣṭhidārikā
T04sanss02u:143: kiṃ nu khalu tvaṃ kulaputrâivaṃrūpām ātmanaḥ kāraṇāṃ kārayāsîti /
T04sanss02u:144: yāvat sā dārikā pūjāprayojanaṃ śrutvā punar āha /
T04sanss02u:147: s te kulaputra tato guṇajātir niṣpatsyate /
T04sanss02u:149: sa dārike kulaputro mama prajñāpāramitām upāyakauśalyaṃ côpadekṣayti /
T04sanss02u:150: tatra vayaṃ śikṣiṣyāmas tatra vayaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvasatvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
T04sanss02u:152: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvam etad avocat /
T04sanss02u:154: yāvad udārāḥ praṇītāś câmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrttitāḥ /
T04sanss02u:158: tathôdārāḥ praṇītāś câmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrttitāḥ /
T04sanss02u:159: api tu khalu kulaputra yena yena kṛtyaṃ tat te dāsyāmi suvarṇaṃ vā
T04sanss02u:160: maṇiṃ vā muktāṃ vā vaiḍūryaṃ vā yāvad yena tvaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisatvaṃ satkariṣyasi /
T04sanss02u:161: yāvad vistareṇa tayā dārikayā pañcaśataparivārayā sārddhaṃ tasya dharmodgatasya saṃkramaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ //
T04sanss02u:162: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ utthāyâsanāt
T04sanss02u:165: sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sapta varṣāṇi na kāmavitarkam
T04sanss02u:167: na vyāpādavitarkaṃ na vihiṃsāvitarkam utpādayām āsa /
T04sanss02u:171: kadā nāma dharmodgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vyutthāsyati /
T04sanss02u:172: yad vayaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmâsanaṃ prajñāpayiṣyāmo yatrâsau kulaputro niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati taṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaṃ siktaṃ saṃmṛṣṭaṃ ca
T04sanss02u:175: sadāpraruditasya bodhisatvasyânuśikṣamāṇāni dvābhyām evêryāpathābhyāṃ kālam atināmayām āsuḥ //
T04sanss02u:176: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvo divyaṃ nirghoṣam
T04sanss02u:177: aśrauṣīd itaḥ saptame divase dharmodgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'smāt samādher vyutthāya madhye nagarasya niṣadya
T04sanss02u:180: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvâttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ
T04sanss02u:181: prītisaumanasyajātas taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ śodhayām āsa sārddhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhaiḥ
T04sanss02u:182: pañcabhir dārikāśatair dharmâsanaṃ prajñapayām āsa saptaratnamayaṃ /
T04sanss02u:183: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ sektukāmaś ca /
T04sanss02u:184: na côdakaṃ samantāt paryeṣamāṇo 'pi labhate yena taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ siñced /
T04sanss02u:185: yathâpi nāma māreṇa pāpīyasā tat sarvam udakam antardhāpitaṃ apy eva nāmâsyôdakam alabhamānasya cittaṃ duṣkhitaṃ syād daurmanasyaṃ ca bhavec cittasya vânyathātvaṃ bhaved yenâsya
T04sanss02u:186: kuśalamūlântardhānaṃ bhaven na vā bhrājeran kuśalamūlāni /
T04sanss02u:187: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyâitad abhūt /
T04sanss02u:188: yan nv aham ātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhvêmaṃ pradeśaṃ rudhireṇa
T04sanss02u:192: mā rajodhātur ito dharmodgatasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya kāye
T04sanss02u:195: varaṃ khalu punar mamâyaṃ kāyâivaṃrūpayā kriyayā vinaśyatu
T04sanss02u:201: yadi punar bhidyante kāmam evaṃrūpeṣv iva dharmasthāneṣu
T04sanss02u:203: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvêti pratisaṃkhyāya
T04sanss02u:206: ntato viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svarudhireṇa sarvam asiñcat /
T04sanss02u:208: na ca sadāprarudito bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya tāsāṃ vā
T04sanss02u:212: kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣavo bodhisatvena mahāsatvena yāvajjīvaṃ na
T04sanss02u:214: tad evaṃ kalyāṇamitrânutsargād ātmabhāvâdīnāṃ rakṣâdikaṃ kāryaṃ //
T04sanss02u:215: sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadêkṣaṇād bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni hi prāyaḥ
T04sanss02u:217: teṣu teṣu sūtrânteṣu bodhisatvasamudācārā bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni prajñaptānîti vacanāt /
T04sanss02u:218: tasmāt tadanīkṣaṇe mā bhūd āpattim āpannasyâpy ajñānād aviratir iti sadā sūtradarśanāyâdaraḥ kāryaḥ /
T04sanss02u:219: tad anena kalyāṇamitrânutsargeṇa sūtrântadarśanena ca sarvaḥ
T04sanss02u:222: yābhir akṣaraniruktibhiḥ so 'nabhilāpyo dharmaḥ sūcyate tāsām
T04sanss02u:225: punar aparaṃ kulaputra ye te dharmabhāṇakâiṣām
T04sanss02u:227: teṣām api dharmabhāṇakānāṃ yat sevanaṃ bhajanaṃ paryupāsanam
T04sanss02u:238: adharme dharmavādināṃ ca pudgalānāṃ saha dharmeṇa nigrahaḥ /
T04sanss02u:243: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yo dharmaśravaṇahetuko vā
T04sanss02u:248: tasya yā nivāraṇā parirakṣâikâgrībhāvo damaḥ śamôpaśamo vinayo 'yam ucyate saddharmaparigrahaḥ /
T04sanss02u:250: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yena dharmeṇa yo 'dharmaḥ pravartate tasya
T04sanss02u:256: na śuddhir na vṛddhis [[DOUBT]] tataś ca so 'pi na bodhisatvêty avaśyakāryaḥ saddharmaparigrahaḥ //
T04sanss02u:264: syād yathâpi nāma devi mahābalavato 'pi puruṣasyâlpo 'pi
T04sanss02u:267: evam eva devi mārasya pāpīyasaḥ parītto 'pi saddharmaparigraho-
T04sanss02u:269: vedhanīyo bhavati śokâvahaḥ paridevakaraś ca bhavati /
T04sanss02u:270: nâhaṃ devi anyam ekam api dharmaṃ kuśalaṃ samanupaśyāmi mārasya
T04sanss02u:276: syād yathâpi nāma devi sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvān
T04sanss02u:277: kulaparvatān abhibhavann abhirocate ca samabhirocate côccatvena
T04sanss02u:279: evam eva devi mahāyānikasya kāyajīvitanirapekṣasya na ca
T04sanss02u:284: parigṛhīto bhavatī jinebhir devebhi nāgebhi ca kinnarebhiḥ /
T04sanss02u:289: sarvatra jātau ca jinaṃ sa paśyati /
T04sanss02u:290: dṛṣṭvā ca tasmiṃl labhate prasādaṃ saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām //
T04sanss02u:301: śakro 'tha brahmā tatha lokapāl-o manuṣyarājā bhuvi cakravarttī /
T04sanss02u:309: na tasya saṃmuhyati bodhi cittaṃ na côddhuraḥ pāramitā carīṣu /
